subject: Wrong Item Received
description_text:
Hello,

Unfortunately, with order number SSN2222 I received the wrong baseplate. The one I received is black, and the pedals are silver.

I had ordered everything in silver. What can we do now?

￼
Kind regards,

Tobias Mainka

conversations.body_text: Hi Tobias Mainka,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our warehouse staff may have been a little confused. We will refund you $20 as compensation. Is that acceptable?

Hello,

Unfortunately, this one doesn’t quite work for me, as it doesn’t look right
on my new rig. I would prefer to receive the silver plate, as per my
original order.

It’s a bit disappointing, especially as the shipping has already taken
quite some time, and I was looking forward to using it.


Thank you very much for your understanding.


Kind regards,

Tobias Mainka

service@simsonn.com
Hi Tobias Mainka,    Okay, we will reship the silver baseplate from our warehouse in Germany. We apologize for the inconvenience!

Hello, thank you very much. What should we do with the black plate?
